title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), when opening the ImageAnalyzer example, it can be observed that the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they do not have any effect. Additionally, when opening a small image such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
